definition: "green tea bitch", a girl who seems innocent and charming but is actually calculating and manipulative
to put on an act (idiom); to show affectation/to indulge in histrionics
to lose money instead of being paid (i.e. sb should pay me, but is actually taking my money)
paying more attention to a lover than friends (idiom)/to value sex over friendship
to leak (of air)/to go flat (of a tire)/to vent one's anger
lit. going round the curves and skirting the corners (idiom)/fig. to speak in a roundabout way/to equivocate/to beat about the bush
to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
lit. one palm alone cannot clap (proverb)/fig. it takes two persons to start a dispute/it takes two to tango/it's difficult to achieve anything without support
pinyin: yi1 ge5 ba1 zhang3 pai1 bu4 xiang3
